_header: Blessed must be our heaven Queen
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour o; carols, of women; women, praise of
_description: John Audelay, ‘De Virginitate’ — six quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘For the loue of a maydon fre / I haue me choson to chastite’

BodDou302.First Lines:
Blessid mot be oure heuen queneffore vergyn & maydyn Sheo was
                    ful cleene…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…ffore aȝayns þe fynd þai made defensewith
                    þe swerd of chastite
